meta.title: CEOLIN Coaching - Body Transformation
meta.description: Calculate your caloric needs and create your personalized body transformation program

landing.hero_description: I'll guide you step by step: we analyze your metabolism, define your real needs and build a custom nutrition program. No generic methods, just what works for you.
landing.triangle_title: The 4 pillars of your energy expenditure
landing.pillar_bmr_desc: The energy your body spends at rest just to function: breathing, heartbeat, body temperature. This is your foundation.
landing.pillar_neat_desc: Everything you burn outside the gym: walking, taking stairs, cooking, fidgeting. Often the most underestimated lever.
landing.pillar_eat_desc: The energy from your training sessions: weight training, cardio, team sports. Contrary to popular belief, it's only a small share.
landing.pillar_tef_desc: The energy your body uses to digest and absorb food. Protein requires the most effort from your body.
landing.cta_bottom_desc: A few questions, and I'll build your personalized program.

quiz.step_sex_desc: Needed to calculate your basal metabolic rate.
quiz.step_goal_desc: Choose the direction of your transformation.
quiz.goal_bulk_desc: Progressive +200 kcal surplus to build muscle
quiz.goal_cut_desc: Progressive -100 kcal deficit to lose fat
quiz.goal_recomp_desc: Caloric maintenance to transform fat into muscle
quiz.step_info_desc: This data is used to calculate your metabolism.
quiz.step_activity_desc: Estimate your daily activity outside of exercise.
quiz.daily_steps_label: How many steps do you average per day?
quiz.daily_steps_desc: Your NEAT varies a lot based on your actual step count. Be as precise as possible.
quiz.step_training_desc: Set your number of sessions and training volume.
quiz.training_day_desc: Select the muscles you train on this session.

results.title: Your personalized program
results.subtitle: Here is your plan based on your data and your goal.
results.target_note_cut: Start with a -100 kcal deficit to begin your cut and follow the protocol progressively.
results.target_note_bulk: Start with a +200 kcal surplus to build muscle and adjust progressively.
results.target_note_recomp: Keep your calories at your total expenditure level to recompose your physique.
results.equiv_protein: Chicken breast, Red meat, Turkey, Whole eggs
results.equiv_carbs: Brown rice, Sweet potato, Oats, Cream of rice, Whole wheat pasta
results.equiv_fat: Whole eggs, Olive oil, Almonds, Peanut butter
results.volume_low: For lagging muscles, aim for a minimum average of 18 sets per week.
results.volume_optimal: Optimal volume: your training volume is in the ideal range.
results.volume_high: High volume: beware of overtraining. Reduce if recovery is insufficient.
results.neat_steps_target: Increasing NEAT is essential: the more steps you take, the higher it gets. Aim for at least 12,500 steps per day.
results.exercise_tip_bulk: Focus on progressive overload with compound movements
results.exercise_tip_cut: Maintain intensity to preserve muscle mass
results.protocol_cut_intro: Start at maintenance calories (TDEE) and adjust progressively.
results.protocol_cut_step_1: Weigh yourself every morning on an empty stomach and log your weight.
results.protocol_cut_step_2: Calculate your weekly average every Sunday.
results.protocol_cut_step_3: If the average doesn't drop after 1-2 weeks, reduce by 100 kcal.
results.protocol_cut_step_4: Repeat until you reach your weight loss goal.
results.protocol_bulk_intro: Start at maintenance calories (TDEE) and increase progressively.
results.protocol_bulk_step_1: Weigh yourself every morning on an empty stomach and log your weight.
results.protocol_bulk_step_2: Calculate your weekly average every Sunday.
results.protocol_bulk_step_3: If the average doesn't rise after 1-2 weeks, add 100 kcal.
results.protocol_bulk_step_4: Aim for 0.25-0.5 kg gain per week to minimize fat gain.
results.protocol_bulk_step_5: Adjust based on your photos and strength measurements.
results.protocol_recomp_intro: Stay at maintenance calories and focus on training progression.
results.protocol_recomp_step_1: Keep your calories at TDEE level.
results.protocol_recomp_step_2: Progressively increase your weights and/or reps.
results.protocol_recomp_step_3: Take monthly photos to track visual changes.
results.protocol_recomp_step_4: Ensure high NEAT (10,000+ steps/day) and sufficient sleep.
results.reverse_intro_cut: After a cutting phase, it's essential to gradually increase your calories to stabilize your metabolism and maintain your results.
results.reverse_intro_bulk: After a bulking phase, gradually reduce your calories to minimize fat gain while keeping the muscle you've built.
results.reverse_intro_recomp: To transition to a new phase (cut or bulk), adjust your calories progressively rather than making sudden changes.
results.reverse_step_1: Adjust by {amount} kcal per week toward your TDEE.
results.reverse_step_2: Monitor your weight and performance weekly.
results.reverse_step_3: Continue until you reach your TDEE ({tdee} kcal), then stabilize for 2-4 weeks.
results.reverse_benefits: Stabilizes metabolism, preserves muscle mass, prevents rebound effect.
results.reverse_motivation: Every step brings you closer to a sustainable physique.
results.tracking_cta_desc: Create your account to log your weight, calories and steps daily and receive personalized recommendations.
results.projection_subtitle: Estimated weight evolution based on your caloric target.

auth.login_subtitle: Sign in to access your tracking dashboard.
auth.signup_subtitle: Sign up to track your progress.
auth.signup_error: Error during signup. Please try again.
auth.signup_success: Check your email to confirm your account.

tracking.no_data: No data yet. Start by logging today's data.
tracking.reco_need_data: Keep logging your data to receive recommendations (minimum 3 days).
tracking.reco_cut_reduce: Your weight is stalling. Consider reducing by 100 kcal this week.
tracking.reco_bulk_increase: No weight gain. Add 100 kcal this week.
tracking.reco_bulk_good: Good progress! Your gain is in the ideal range.
tracking.reco_steps_low: Averaging {steps} steps/day. Aim for 10,000 to optimize your NEAT.
tracking.reco_steps_good: Excellent! {steps} steps/day average, your NEAT is high.
tracking.reco_keep_tracking: Keep logging your data for more accurate recommendations.
tracking.adjust_bulk_no_gain: No weight gain detected. Suggestion: increase to {calories} kcal (+100).
tracking.adjust_cut_no_loss: No weight loss detected. Suggestion: decrease to {calories} kcal (-100).

compte.name: Name
compte.no_data: You haven't taken the quiz yet. Take it to get your personalized program.
